property.name: hive.server2.webui.host
property.description: The host address the HiveServer2 WebUI will listen on

property.name: hive.server2.webui.port
property.description: The port the HiveServer2 WebUI will listen on. This can beset to 0 or a negative integer to disable the web UI

property.name: hive.server2.webui.max.threads
property.description: The max HiveServer2 WebUI threads

property.name: hive.server2.webui.use.ssl
property.description: Set this to true for using SSL encryption for HiveServer2 WebUI.

property.name: hive.server2.webui.keystore.path
property.description: SSL certificate keystore location for HiveServer2 WebUI.

property.name: hive.server2.webui.keystore.password
property.description: SSL certificate keystore password for HiveServer2 WebUI.

property.name: hive.server2.webui.use.spnego
property.description: If true, the HiveServer2 WebUI will be secured with SPNEGO. Clients must authenticate with Kerberos.

property.name: hive.server2.webui.spnego.keytab
property.description: The path to the Kerberos Keytab file containing the HiveServer2 WebUI SPNEGO service principal.

property.name: hive.server2.webui.spnego.principal
property.description: The HiveServer2 WebUI SPNEGO service principal. The special string _HOST will be replaced automatically with the value of hive.server2.webui.host or the correct host name.

property.name: hive.server2.webui.max.historic.queries
property.description: The maximum number of past queries to show in HiverSever2 WebUI.

property.name: hive.server2.webui.use.pam
property.description: If true, the HiveServer2 WebUI will be secured with PAM.

property.name: hive.server2.webui.enable.cors
property.description: Whether to enable cross origin requests (CORS)

property.name: hive.server2.webui.cors.allowed.origins
property.description: Comma separated list of origins that are allowed when CORS is enabled.

property.name: hive.server2.webui.cors.allowed.methods
property.description: Comma separated list of http methods that are allowed when CORS is enabled.

property.name: hive.server2.webui.cors.allowed.headers
property.description: Comma separated list of http headers that are allowed when CORS is enabled.

property.name: hive.server2.transport.mode
property.description: Expects one of [binary, http]. Transport mode of HiveServer2.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.bind.host
property.description: Bind host on which to run the HiveServer2 Thrift service.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.http.port
property.description: Port number of HiveServer2 Thrift interface when hive.server2.transport.mode is 'http'.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.http.path
property.description: Path component of URL endpoint when in HTTP mode.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.max.message.size
property.description: Maximum message size in bytes a HS2 server will accept.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.http.max.idle.time
property.description: Expects a time value with unit (d/day, h/hour, m/min, s/sec, ms/msec, us/usec, ns/nsec), which is msec if not specified. Maximum idle time for a connection on the server when in HTTP mode.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.http.worker.keepalive.time
property.description: Expects a time value with unit (d/day, h/hour, m/min, s/sec, ms/msec, us/usec, ns/nsec), which is sec if not specified. Keepalive time for an idle http worker thread. When the number of workers exceeds min workers, excessive threads are killed after this time interval.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.http.request.header.size
property.description: Request header size in bytes, when using HTTP transport mode. Jetty defaults used.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.http.response.header.size
property.description: Response header size in bytes, when using HTTP transport mode. Jetty defaults used.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.http.compression.enabled
property.description: Enable thrift http compression via Jetty compression support

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.http.cookie.auth.enabled
property.description: When true, HiveServer2 in HTTP transport mode, will use cookie based authentication mechanism.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.http.cookie.max.age
property.description: Expects a time value with unit (d/day, h/hour, m/min, s/sec, ms/msec, us/usec, ns/nsec), which is sec if not specified. Maximum age in seconds for server side cookie used by HS2 in HTTP mode.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.http.cookie.domain
property.description: Domain for the HS2 generated cookies

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.http.cookie.path
property.description: Path for the HS2 generated cookies

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.http.cookie.is.secure
property.description: Deprecated: Secure attribute of the HS2 generated cookie (this is automatically enabled for SSL enabled HiveServer2).

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.http.cookie.is.httponly
property.description: HttpOnly attribute of the HS2 generated cookie.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.port
property.description: Port number of HiveServer2 Thrift interface when hive.server2.transport.mode is 'binary'.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.sasl.qop
property.description: Expects one of [auth, auth-int, auth-conf]. Sasl QOP value; set it to one of following values to enable higher levels of protection for HiveServer2 communication with clients. Setting hadoop.rpc.protection to a higher level than HiveServer2 does not make sense in most situations. HiveServer2 ignores hadoop.rpc.protection in favor of hive.server2.thrift.sasl.qop. "auth" - authentication only (default) "auth-int" - authentication plus integrity protection "auth-conf" - authentication plus integrity and confidentiality protection This is applicable only if HiveServer2 is configured to use Kerberos authentication.

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.min.worker.threads
property.description: Minimum number of Thrift worker threads

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.max.worker.threads
property.description: Maximum number of Thrift worker threads

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.exponential.backoff.slot.length
property.description: Expects a time value with unit (d/day, h/hour, m/min, s/sec, ms/msec, us/usec, ns/nsec), which is msec if not specified. Binary exponential backoff slot time for Thrift clients during login to HiveServer2, for retries until hitting Thrift client timeout

property.name: hive.server2.thrift.login.timeout
property.description: Expects a time value with unit (d/day, h/hour, m/min, s/sec, ms/msec, us/usec, ns/nsec), which is sec if not specified. Timeout for Thrift clients during login to HiveServer2

property.name: hive.server2.session.check.interval
property.description: Expects a time value with unit (d/day, h/hour, m/min, s/sec, ms/msec, us/usec, ns/nsec), which is msec if not specified. The time should be bigger than or equal to 3000 msec. The check interval for session/operation timeout, which can be disabled by setting to zero or negative value.

property.name: hive.server2.close.session.on.disconnect
property.description: Session will be closed when connection is closed. Set this to false to have session outlive its parent connection.

property.name: hive.server2.idle.session.timeout
property.description: Expects a time value with unit (d/day, h/hour, m/min, s/sec, ms/msec, us/usec, ns/nsec), which is msec if not specified. Session will be closed when it's not accessed for this duration, which can be disabled by setting to zero or negative value.

property.name: hive.metastore.warehouse.dir
property.description: location of default database for the warehouse

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionPassword
property.description: password to use against metastore database

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionDriverName
property.description: Driver class name for a JDBC metastore

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionUserName
property.description: Username to use against metastore database

property.name: datanucleus.transactionIsolation
property.description: Default transaction isolation level for identity generation.
